question: Question_A_22
sols:
The probability of moving from location 3 to location 1 in one time step
is $\displaystyle P_{1,3} = 0.1626$.
hints:
The probability of moving from location $\displaystyle i$ to location
$\displaystyle j$ in one time step is $\displaystyle P_{j,i}$.

This is the same as the \emph{i}-th entry of the vector
\emph{P\textbf{ej}}.
